tutorials.title: Lab 1: Introduction to Labs and Workshops
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of the labs (livelabs) and workshops.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Get Started with Git and Set up the Environment
tutorials.description: This lab walks you through the required and optional tasks to set up the GitHub Development Environment, and install GitHub Desktop.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Understand the Folder Structure
tutorials.description: This lab describes the prescribed folder structure that we need follow for developing labs and workshops.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Use Atom Editor to Develop Markdown Content
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to develop your lab (markdown) content using an editor, such as **Atom** and starting the atom-live-server.

tutorials.title: Lab 5: Use GitHub to Commit to Git Repository (Git Web UI)
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to map a node's private IP address to a public IP address

tutorials.title: Lab 6:  Add GitHub Hosted Labs and Workshop to OHC
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to use Cloudera Manager (CM) and Hue to access a Big Data Service (BDS) cluster.
